room_title: Escape room "Legacy Lost" by The Exit Room in Kansas City
room_address: 304 SW Market Street Lee’s Summit, MO 64063
room_description: The famous adventurer and archeologist, Clive Plitger, has died, and his collection of treasure and artifacts is now up for grabs. Can you find the treasure’s hidden location and escape before Plitger’s enemies arrive and take it by force?
